list.name: Default
list.comment: Refactored code for separating mysql codes from the main servlet code.

task.summary: Removed user creation code from the main servlet code to the new InsertNewUser file.
Passwords can be stored in the DB now along with the user information
After successful registration, code now forwards user to a separate page.
Moved mysql database connection files under mysql package.
Added mongodb driver in the code
Moved insert use code to the mysql package.
Refactored code for separating mysql codes from the main servlet code.
Refactored code for separating mysql codes from the main servlet code.
Refactored code for separating mysql codes from the main servlet code.
Created new mongodb connection code. Servlets now use mongodb as database.
Fixed bug: No need to close mongodb connection
Updated website code with the new responsive website design.
Modified index.jsp file based on the new bootstrap design.
Changed the password generation code to use SHA-1 hash during password generation.
